Developing an urban farm that utilizes vertical gardens and hydroponic systems to provide fresh produce and reduce food waste.
Building a community center that incorporates renewable energy sources such as solar panels and wind turbines.
Creating a composting system that utilizes organic waste to produce nutrient-rich soil for the urban farm.
Developing a recycling program that includes a deposit system for beverage containers and a composting program for food waste.
Implementing a rainwater harvesting system that collects rainwater from the community center's roof and uses it for irrigation and other non-potable uses.
